document.heading: Genetic Tests for the Establishment of Paternity Amendment Act of 1990

history.narrative: Law 8-126, the “Genetic Tests for the Establishment of Paternity Amendment Act of 1990,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 8-336, which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on February 13, 1990, and February 27, 1990, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 15, 1990, it was assigned Act No. 8-179 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
